inclusion.criterion: Must be able to comply with all study requirements for the duration of the study as outlined in the protocol.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be able to understand and be willing to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must live within 75 km of the treatment site
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Had followed the bariatric multidisciplinary workup (blood analyses, dietician, psychologist and doctor appointments)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Achalasia and any other esophageal motility disorders
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe renal, hepatic, pulmonary disease or cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and vomiting. She has several gallstones and biliary sludge, but no other exclusion criteria mentioned.
